thread.title: Angel di Maria scores belting free-kick for PSG against Barcelona… and the Man United jokes start IMMEDIATELY
thread.title_full: Angel di Maria scores belting free-kick for PSG against Barcelona… and the Man United jokes start IMMEDIATELY

author: Richard Innes
title: Angel di Maria scores belting free-kick for PSG against Barcelona… and the Man United jokes start IMMEDIATELY
text:
Think he's happy with that effort? (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) Share     
Angel di Maria's free-kick against Barcelona was a beauty. 
Paris Saint-Germain's classy Argentinian winger opened the scoring in the Champions League tie at the Parc de Princes, as the French side took a deserved lead against the Catalans during an impressive first half display. 
For most fans, Di Maria's belter was something to sit and admire; a demonstration of skill that deserved admiration. Di Maria doing his stuff (Photo: REUTERS) 
However, there is a sizeable part of the online world that doesn't look at such things the same way others do. For this section of society, an act of brilliance from a guy who joined PSG 18 months ago demands something else. 
A joke at Manchester United's expense. *facepalm* 
For those of you who have forgotten, United paid a (then) record £59.7million to bring Di Maria to Old Trafford in 2014… before selling him to PSG for £44.3million a year later. 
So, despite the fact that he last represented United in 2014/15, how do you think a certain sort of online fan greeted Di Maria's goal against Barca? 
We'll give you three guesses… We know at least one man who may not be terribly happy to see people being reminded about Di Maria's Old Trafford career… Like us on Facebook
